title: Glorious Homecoming
description: "I heard he sleeps with the neighbor's wife any time her husband's on a business trip." It was a town on the outskirts of Seoul, but technically no different from the countryside. I once thought it was a warm, tight-knit community, but in reality, it was a place full of beasts. The kindness I had shown was twisted into malice, and my family was driven out of there. But now I've regained my power, I will gloriously return to that town's deepest places.
author: NARU
